description.value:
Tapping into your draconic origins, your presence starts to become much more terrifying in your form as a Nirik. This aura is a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]. An enemy that enters or ends its turn in the aura must attempt a Will save against the higher of your spell DC or class DC. The DC for allies who have travelled with you for a longer period of time is reduced by 5.

Success The creature is unaffected and temporarily immune to your Frightful Aura for 1 minute.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 1}

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 2}
